heroBody: Credible, independent, and internationally certified valuations for real estate, businesses, and intangible assets. Accepted by financial institutions, courts, and tax authorities.
whyHeading: A Valuation Is Only as Good as the Expert Behind It
whyBody1: Whether you're buying, selling, financing, or reporting — the credibility of a valuation depends entirely on the methodology, independence, and certification of the valuer. An incorrect or unsupported opinion can have serious financial and legal consequences.
whyBody2: Our certified valuers apply internationally recognized standards (IVS, RICS Red Book) and deploy the most appropriate methodology for each asset class. Every report is fully documented, defensible, and accepted by major financial institutions and government bodies.
whyBody3: From a single property appraisal to a full business valuation for a complex M&A transaction, our team has the experience to deliver a credible, court-ready opinion on time.
whyAlertBody: All valuations comply with IVS and are performed by RICS-accredited professionals with recognized expertise.
checklist1: Certified valuers with RICS and local professional accreditation
checklist3: Independent and objective — free from conflicts of interest
checklist4: Accepted by banks, tax authorities, and courts
checklist6: Site inspection and management interviews included
approachesBody: We select and reconcile the most appropriate methodology for each specific assignment.
approach1Desc: Values assets based on their capacity to generate future economic benefits — using DCF, capitalization of earnings, or dividend discount models.
approach2Desc: Derives value by comparing to recent transactions involving similar assets — the most market-reflective methodology when comparable data exists.
approach3Desc: Establishes value based on the cost to reproduce or replace an asset, adjusted for physical deterioration and functional or economic obsolescence.
service1Desc: Market-value appraisals of residential, commercial, and industrial properties for sale, purchase, financing, or insurance purposes.
service2Desc: Comprehensive assessment of a company's fair market value — essential for M&A, shareholder disputes, estate planning, or strategic decisions.
service3Desc: Independent feasibility and valuation analysis of investment projects, including DCF modelling, IRR calculation, and risk-adjusted return analysis.
service4Desc: Valuation of brands, patents, software, customer relationships, and other intangible assets for accounting, licensing, or transaction purposes.
service5Desc: Expert valuation opinions and witness services for court proceedings, arbitration, and regulatory disputes requiring independent certification.
service6Desc: Appraisals of land plots including development potential analysis, zoning assessment, and highest-and-best-use studies.
process1Desc: We establish the purpose of valuation, standard of value, and effective date — ensuring the assignment is precisely defined.
process2Desc: Our valuers gather all relevant financial, physical, and market data — conducting site visits and management interviews where required.
process3Desc: We apply the most appropriate valuation methodologies (income, market, cost approaches) and reconcile conclusions into a final value opinion.
process4Desc: A comprehensive, certified valuation report is delivered — meeting the requirements of banks, courts, regulators, and auditors.
ctaHeading: Know the True Value of Your Assets
ctaBody: Whether for a transaction, financing, litigation, or reporting — our certified valuers deliver opinions you can rely on.
